commits.message: GUI-1483: Fix unhealthy host count metric/chart for ELB Monitoring page
GUI-1483: Minimum value for ELB health check passes/failures count is 2
GUI-1483: Add bubble help for possible load balancer port values
GUI-1483: Modify availability zone selector and cross-zone field to match updated wireframe
GUI-1483, GUI-1620: Better handling of cross-zone ELB support
GUI-1483, GUI-1484: CSS fixes for Create ELB wizard
GUI-1483: Initial progress moving ELB Health Checks tab to dedicated view/template
GUI-1483: Initial progress moving ELB Monitoring tab to dedicated view/template

Merge branch 'GUI-1484' into GUI-1483

Conflicts:
	eucaconsole/forms/elbs.py
GUI-1483: Validation input fixes for ports in ELB listener editor
GUI-1483: Add unit tests for normalize_listener method
GUI-1483: Update magic search bar facets and margins on ELB Instances page
GUI-1483: Layout changes for protocol/port selection in ELB listener editor to match updated wireframe
GUI-1483: Disable Save Changes button on ELB Health Checks tab until changes are made; minor ELB detail page CSS refactoring
GUI-1483: Complete work to move ELB Health Checks tab to a dedicated view/template
GUI-1483: Reminders to remove custom ELB tagset and attribute classes when we update to Boto 2.38 or later
Merge branch 'GUI-1484' into GUI-1483

Merge pull request #1406 from eucalyptus/GUI-1483

GUI-1483, GUI-1620, GUI-1648: ELB detail pages
GUI-1483: Update ping port when protocol is selected, and improve validation handling for ping path on the ELB Health Checks page
GUI-1483, GUI-1620: Avoid extra API call when obtaining cross-zone load balancing status
GUI-1483: Prevent 500 error when updating subnets for a VPC-enabled ELB; minor style fix for subnet tile headers on ELB Instances tab
GUI-1483: Removed unneeded code from ELB detail page JS; restore tabs order to match wireframe
GUI-1483: More changes to move ELB monitoring tab to distinct view/template
Merge branch 'master' into GUI-1483

Merge branch 'GUI-1484' into GUI-1483
Adjusted the elb view page to use the elb listener editor and tag editor panels

Conflicts:
	eucaconsole/static/js/widgets/elb_listener_editor.js
GUI-1483: Code review feedback
GUI-1483: Validation fixes for ELB listener editor
GUI-1483: Hide rather than disable "Enable zone" button when no zones are available
GUI-1483: Add sleep delay to prevent listeners list from vanishing when changes are saved on ELB General tab; add unit tests for ELB General and Monitoring tab; minor HTML, CSS, and JS cleanup
GUI-1483: Warn user if there are unsaved changes on ELB General, Instances, or Health Checks tab
GUI-1483: Move ELB Instances tab to dedicated view/template
GUI-1483: Simplify CSS styles for ELB detail page tabs and tables
Merge branch 'master' into GUI-1483

Merge branch 'master' into GUI-1483

Conflicts:
	eucaconsole/static/css/eucaconsole.css

GUI-1483: Display ELB instance health status rather than running/stopped/terminated status when an instance is in an ELB.  Hide subnet selector and button when all available subnets have been selected for a VPC ELB;
GUI-1483: Conditionally display ping path based on protocol choice on ELB Health Checks page;  add unit tests for ELB Instances and Health Checks views
GUI-1483: Default to Monitoring tab (except for Manage Instances link) when navigating to ELB detail page from the landing page; minor XHTML fix
GUI-1483: Fetch proper ELB VPC network name on Instances tab
GUI-1483, GUI-1648: Set titles for CloudWatch charts on ELB Monitoring page

Merge branch 'master' into GUI-1483
Adjusted checks for empty instance and vpc subnet objects for the ELB detail page

Conflicts:
	eucaconsole/templates/panels/form_field_row.pt
GUI-1483: Disable Save Changes button and display validation notice if no availability zones or subnets are selected when modifying an ELB
GUI-1483: Avoid wiping out all ELB listeners when an add listener call fails
GUI-1483: Better handling of missing source security group
GUI-1483: Remove unused cross-zone field CSS and simplify HTML for instance selector
GUI-1483, GUI-1648: Set proper namespace for CloudWatch charts on ELB Monitoring page; better default min/max range for y-axis values
GUI-1483: Avoid breaking health check configuration in Create ELB wizard
GUI-1483: Simplify retrieval and update of idle timeout, no longer requiring custom attribute classes
GUI-1483: Move Save Changes button and Cancel link to proper location.  Resolve duplicate id attributes for valid HTML

	eucaconsole/templates/elbs/elb_view.pt

GUI-1483: Make tile status sentence case in AZ/subnets on ELB Instances page; update status colors in instance selector
GUI-1483: Don't show healthy/unhealthy status in zone/subnet tile footer unless there are instances in the zone/subnet
GUI-1483: Remove launch config help text from ELB details page
GUI-1483: Don't show unsaved changes modal when submitting forms on the ELB detail page tabs
